About Me

Few things about me...

Bio

I am interested in web development, both front & back end. The industry is fast paced and constantly moving, therefore one that requires constant learning. As a lover of learning this is interesting to me as there will always be new things to learn, new challenges to overcome and the mastery of time gained.

When not coding you could catch me over a latte or an expresso , I listen to music mostly Indie or anything soft & lose interest when it is getting mainstream, I enjoy books of Hulbert Footner the fictional Rosika Storey read a couple of them, I also to read Letters To A Young Poet by Rainer Maria Rilke. It gets prettier when watching detective, crime or emotional dramas which helps to answer some life's difficult questions & to help with work life balance . How could I forget to mention my love of geography and relationships of countries with one another which many might refer to as Geopolitics, about my unbendable love of the Airbus brand and my gems of the sky the Airbus A380, A350-1000LR, & the Boeing 787 Dreamliner that pioneered a different style to fly. I am a lifelong member of LessonsLearnedInLife.com. About my love of abstract ideas and paintings, a lover of digital photography. A believer of the Slow movement culture. I enjoy traveling which is also good for the soul, the long, the short we are good count me in, especially for long haul.
